So my The World's power and precision are both superior!
I have decided that I will show no mercy when
fighting one of the Joestar bloodline, but will kill them instantly!
The way to end you is with The World's true power!
The characters, groups, places, laws, and names used in this program have no connection to any existing in real life.
With this, the Joestar bloodline will finally end.
My archenemies, who dared to make an appearance in my destiny...
So it is the same type of Stand as Star Platinum.
The World and Star Platinum are the same type of Stand?!
Or is he moving his hand subconsciously?
I asked if you could see me, Jotaro!
I do not know what you are talking about, Dio.
It does not matter if you can see me during stopped time or not!
If you can move the same way as my The World,
Yes, it was six months ago when I first stopped time.
In order to test out my Stand's power and speed,
I had one of my servants fire a shotgun at me.
As I went to catch the pellets...
it looked like everything had stopped.
That is when it all began.
At first, I thought it was an illusion.
Trained boxers and those who are in accidents
feel each moment as if it were several seconds or minutes...
I thought it was something like that.
But The World was able to step
around the pellets that hung suspended in stopped time.
You will surely be able to control time!
You must believe with more conviction that you can move within stopped time!
Like being able to snap an HB pencil in half with your fingers!
You must believe it is a perfectly natural thing for you to do.
What is most important is to recognize it as such.
You must believe that it is natural for you to do it!
You are the emperor of this world!
It is only natural for you to control time!
And then one day, I felt the wheels of time
truly enmesh themselves with The World.
It was like a beam of light piercing the darkness.
It truly was a magnificent feeling.
I, Dio, had truly surpassed all forms of life and all Stands!
And now, I can stop time for five seconds, and longer and longer intervals each time!
I shall see just how powerful you truly are!
You had placed that magnet on me.
When we were testing each other's strength earlier?
It looks like a magnet taken from a wallet or pocket planner.
I cannot take my eyes off you for a second.
If you are using a trick like this,
that proves you cannot move during stopped time!
You only added a few more seconds to your life!
Only for a moment, but he can move!
The magnet was not to trick me into thinking he could move...
But to trick me into thinking he could not, and lure me closer!
You must believe it is only natural that you can stop time!
Of all things, this descendant of the Joestars
has invaded my world of stopped time...
I could move for a moment...
It was only enough to get one punch in.
Fetch my leg from over there.
Behave like a flight attendant, bringing a drink
and caviar to a first-class passenger!
I guess I have to bash your head to pieces,
or it will be like nothing ever happened.
You have already recovered your energy.
Because that hole I put in your gut is closed up now.
Your eyes followed me in the world of stopped time...
So you truly can see my movements, Jotaro.
Kakyoin did quite well for you.
Because he figured out the secret of The World's powers,
you were able to figure out that you could move during stopped time,
and so, you were able to invade my world.
Just how long can you move within my world of stopped time?
Or perhaps you can move five seconds,
just like me, and you are just pretending that you cannot?
I could move longer with some practice,
but right now, a moment is the best I can do.
I believe that you can only move for a moment now.
But since you have invaded my world of stopped time,
it would not be wise to underestimate you by getting close.
Even when I still have an overwhelming advantage.
Therefore, Jotaro, I have decided how to kill you
such that it does not matter how long you can move!
you realized that you face a more horrific fate than that geezer Joseph.
How the hell does he come up with stuff like this?
Once time begins to move again,
I wonder if even your Star Platinum
can manage to deflect so many knives.
Being able to see this must be all the more terrifying, Jotaro!
Is that all you can do?
This proves that you really can move only for a moment.
I will add one more, just to be sure.
To be frank, I am relieved that
I could defeat you so quickly, Jotaro.
I never thought you would be able to enter my stopped time.
As I see it, those machines known as automobiles are useful devices,
but because everyone has one, the streets become too crowded.
Only I, Dio, should have power over stopped time.
Now my valuable uniform is full of holes.
I stuffed my clothes with magazines just in case he tried throwing anything...
But I did not think he would throw that many knives at me.
Playing dead and waiting for a chance to strike is the
best chance I have right now.
I need to figure out how to knock off his head...
I would better play it safe.
The Joestar bloodline has proven itself rather lucky.
He might be trying to trick me by playing dead.
I must end him beyond a shadow of a doubt!
chopping his head off with this!
This is truly the end for you,
And time will move once more.
and with just a tiny bit more force,
you could have torn my brain apart with your rapier.
will be no more, once I finish you.
I wanted to play dead as long as possible,
until I could land a blow to his head, but...
It would be easy for me to keep Polnareff's head on his shoulders.
But Dio will not enter Star Platinum's attack range.
It will end up like it did last time.
I have to make sure he does not realize I am alive.
As long as he does not know for sure,
my chance to get close to him will come.
I tried my hardest to move inside his stopped time,
but now I have to try my hardest to stay completely still.
You are alive... or you are coming around.
We have guns pointed at you!
There is something I would like you to shoot with that gun.
Shoot the man lying on the ground over there.
You can shoot his leg, his torso...
Perhaps I was just imagining that sound I thought
What a sick thing to do...
But now Dio's attention is on me, not Polnareff.
Right now, he is suspicious as all hell.
He will try to make absolutely sure that I am dead.
This is when things get really dangerous.
If I black out, I really will die.
It will not even be funny...
If I die because I used my Stand to stop my own heart...
I thought he was still alive, but it was just my imagination.
Just in case, I will lop off his head so that I can truly rest at ease.
But even if you stop time,
I am still going to blow your head off, Dio.
Finally, I was able to bash his head in.
But that bastard Dio is a monster
who survived a hundred years at the bottom of the ocean.
I cannot believe he is dead yet.
It is too soon to relax.
I have a headache... a-and nausea...
My head's been destroyed, so I cannot get up?!
I covered you with gasoline so I can track your smell.
I feel bad, kicking a guy when he is down, but...
I do not feel bad about this at all.
My friends and a lot of innocent bystanders
If I can get to that place...
He put his ear to the ground to listen for cars coming near.
I cannot let him get away!
If I can just get there...
You have lost in the battle of wits against me, Dio!
Does not this street look familiar?
It was my escape route to take the blood of Joseph Joestar!
This trip was truly fun, was not it?
Joestar blood suits me so well!
